text: Then you are an unlicensed operator. No registry, no trade routes. No trade routes, no resupply. No resupply, no spare parts. The Union does not punish; it prices.

actions.label: Oh.. I see, in that case.. Where do I sign?
Prefer to not provide a name
actions.reply: I still don't want to name it.

actions.label: I'll figure it out myself. Goodbye
